flounder.physics.shapes

Interface IShape<T extends IShape>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of shape.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AABB, Sphere

    public interface IShape<T extends IShape>
    A simple class that represents a physical shape.

      • contains

        boolean contains(T other)
        Tests whether another this shape completely contains the other.
        Parameters:
        other - The shape being tested for containment
        Returns:
        True if other is contained by this shape, false otherwise.

                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Returns:
        Data about the calculated intersection.
        Throws:

      • intersectsRay

        boolean intersectsRay(Ray ray)
        Calculates intersection between this shape and a ray.
        Parameters:
        ray - The ray to test if there is an intersection with.
        Returns:
        If there is a intersection between this shape and a ray.
